properties.entry: SELECT POST_NO, POST_TITLE, POST_CONTENT, MEMBER_NICKNAME, POST_VIEW, POST_DATE FROM POST P JOIN POST_CATEGORY USING (POST_CAT_NO) JOIN MEMBER USING (MEMBER_NO) ORDER BY POST_NO DESC
SELECT STORE_NO, STORE_NAME, STORE_ADDRESS, STORE_PHONE ,STORE_TIME, STATUS, BRAND_NAME FROM STORE JOIN BRAND USING (BRAND_NO)
SELECT POST_NO, POST_TITLE, POST_CONTENT, POST_VIEW, POST_DATE FROM POST WHERE MEMBER_NO = ?
SELECT BRAND_NO, MENU_NO, MENU_NAME, MENU_PRICE, MENU_CATEGORY, MENU_DESC, M.STATUS, BRAND_NAME FROM MENU M JOIN BRAND USING (BRAND_NO)
